description:
Haunted Hotel: The Evil Inside Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It came out on 30-09-2017. Big Fish Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Haunted Hotel: The Evil Inside Collector's Edition on PC.
